sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, @ihuomalindaejiofor/Instagram
Agbamakwụkwọ bụ otu emume na-ebute aṅụrị ebe niile mana ihe dị ịche na-adị na ha.
Iji maatụ, n'ime ndị niile gbara akwụkwọ n'afọ a, naanị ụfọdụ mara ebe niile jijiji.
Ụmụnwaanyị Igbo bụ 'olu gbajie boys'
Dimkpa Ndịgbo ụmụnwaanyị na-achọ ka akara dị ọkụ
Ihe isii i na-ekwesịghị ime na social media gị
Lee ụfọdụ n'ime ha ebe a:
Linda Ejiofor na Ibrahim Suleiman
Ndị na-eme ihe onyonyo 'Tinsel' bụ Linda Ejiofor na Ibrahim Suleiman, ji "#ISquared2018" wuo ewu mgbe ha lụrụ onwe ha n'ọnwa Nọvemba.

Edemede a nwere ihe ndị si na Instagram. Anyị na-achọ ka i nye anyị ikike tupu e tinye ihe ọbụla, dịka akụrụngwa cookies na tekịnụzụ ndị ọzọ nwereike ịdị na ya. I nwereike ịgụ Instagram iwu cookie na iwu nzuzo tupu ị nabata ya. Iji kirie ihe nọ n'ime ya, họrọ 'nabata na gaa n'ihu'.
End of Instagram post, 1
Ọkparaeze Harry na Meghan Markle
Ebe foto si, Getty Images
Agbamakwụkwọ ha mere ụbọchị 19 nke ọnwa Mee, wuru ewu mere na akọchabeghi maka ya ruo ugbua.
Francis Uzoho na nwunye ya
Onye ọgba bọọlụ otu egwuregwu Super Eagles nke Naịjirịa bụ Francis Uzoho, dị afọ 20, gbara nwkụ nwaanyị ya n'Imo steeti n'oge ekeresimesi na Naịjirịa.

Edemede a nwere ihe ndị si na Instagram. Anyị na-achọ ka i nye anyị ikike tupu e tinye ihe ọbụla, dịka akụrụngwa cookies na tekịnụzụ ndị ọzọ nwereike ịdị na ya. I nwereike ịgụ Instagram iwu cookie na iwu nzuzo tupu ị nabata ya. Iji kirie ihe nọ n'ime ya, họrọ 'nabata na gaa n'ihu'.
End of Instagram post, 2
Gbemi Olateru-Olagbegi na Femisoro Ajayi
#TheGFShow bụ ọzọ wuru ewu mgbe onye ntaakụkọ n'igwe okwu bụ Gbemi Olateru-Olagbegi na onye nchịkọta otiegwu 'Falz' bụ Femisoro Ajayi gbara akwụkwọ.

Edemede a nwere ihe ndị si na Instagram. Anyị na-achọ ka i nye anyị ikike tupu e tinye ihe ọbụla, dịka akụrụngwa cookies na tekịnụzụ ndị ọzọ nwereike ịdị na ya. I nwereike ịgụ Instagram iwu cookie na iwu nzuzo tupu ị nabata ya. Iji kirie ihe nọ n'ime ya, họrọ 'nabata na gaa n'ihu'.
End of Instagram post, 3
Chris Attoh na Bettie Jenifer
Mgbe ya na nwunye ochie ya bụ Damilola Adegbite gbachara alụkwaghịm, Chris Attoh, onye Gana bụ ome ihe nkiri a ma ama, mere ihe tụrụ mmadụ niile n'anya mgbe ọ lụrụ Betrite Jennifer.

Edemede a nwere ihe ndị si na Instagram. Anyị na-achọ ka i nye anyị ikike tupu e tinye ihe ọbụla, dịka akụrụngwa cookies na tekịnụzụ ndị ọzọ nwereike ịdị na ya. I nwereike ịgụ Instagram iwu cookie na iwu nzuzo tupu ị nabata ya. Iji kirie ihe nọ n'ime ya, họrọ 'nabata na gaa n'ihu'.
End of Instagram post, 4
Fatima Dangote na Jamil Abubakar
Njịkọ nwa ọgaranya bụ Aliko Dangote nakwa Jamil Abubakar, butere ihe yiri ala ọmajiji n'obodo Legọs.
Nke bụ na o butere ide ji ego bụ Bill Gates, nakwa onyeisiala mba Gana bụ Nana Akufo-Addo, so na ndị isi a hụrụ kwaba okpu bịara agbamakwụkwọ a.

Edemede a nwere ihe ndị si na Instagram. Anyị na-achọ ka i nye anyị ikike tupu e tinye ihe ọbụla, dịka akụrụngwa cookies na tekịnụzụ ndị ọzọ nwereike ịdị na ya. I nwereike ịgụ Instagram iwu cookie na iwu nzuzo tupu ị nabata ya. Iji kirie ihe nọ n'ime ya, họrọ 'nabata na gaa n'ihu'.
End of Instagram post, 5
Priyanka Chopra na Nick Jonas
Priyanka Chopra bụ ezenwaanyị mma nakwa omeihe onyonyo na mbaụwa niile lụrụ onye otiegwu mba Amerịka bụ Nick Jonas na mba India.
Mmemme e mere iji kwado ya bụ agbamakwụkwọ ruru otu izuụka.
Ebe foto si, Instagram/@priyankachopra

Igbo Proverbs: I dabanye n'ọnọdụ ndị a, were ilu igbo ndị a kwuo okwuEmelitere ikpeazụ na: 24 Julaị 2024
